website_summaries.verdict: Fast-acting formula that works without burning or stripping layers of skin. Discreet tube and easy to dispense.
pros: Contains Aloe Vera, vitamin E, and baby oil to soothe skin during and after removal
Suitable for under arms, bikini area, and limbs
Dermatologist-tested and excellent customer service that is happy to issue refunds if you’re displeased
cons: Can’t be used on the face and is somewhat expensive considering how thick the application has to be

customer_reviews.title: I was super impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: I have really thick hair and a lot of it in in addition to sensitive skin. I hadn’t shaved my back in a few months so I realized shaving wasn’t going to cut it and I would need hair remover. This product literally removed all my hair within 10 mins and left my back silky smooth with no irritation; I was super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Dong

customer_reviews.title: works best
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my lady parts because I have extremely sensitive skin when it comes to shaving and waxing, especially if it's frequently. Fierce ingrown hairs and razor burn. I tried a small spot first and didn't have any side effects so I went for the whole shebang. Left it on for 9 minutes. Wiped off with a warm washcloth and boom, silky smooth everywhere! I would recommend layering it a little thick so it works best at getting all the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Selina

customer_reviews.title: definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I love it, i had to leave it for a little longer than 10 minutes (even though my hair its thin) but it was easy to take out with a damp cloth, and it was so soft! the downside is that it said it lasts longer than shaving but it lasted a few days until they started growing again, all in all I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund

customer_reviews.title: Amazing feel and results.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to remove my private area hair , under my arms & legs... did a nice job of that ... I would recommend this product it did exactly what it was made to do in the time it said & the smell was mild if any - the only con was that like all of this type of product it’s a bit messy ( to be expected thou ) I will be buying this product again two thumbs up for sure
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: I found this product very simple to use, it did not have as strong of a smell as other hair removal products, and it was much gentler on my sensitive skin. I typically have horrible red bumps and burning when using hard removers and this one was a much better experience. The hair wiped away easily for the most part. I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, with very little chemical smell or irritation. Only time there was a problem was on broken skin. This can totally be used on a clean, dry, and unbroken nether region so long as it doesn't get INSIDE anything. If you are worried, leave the product on for less time that recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This hair removal cream worked ok. I did have to put on a second coat to completely remove the hair is the reason for the overall of 4 stars and the container didn't have enough for a second coat everywhere. It did not burn my skin like other creams have in the past. I do wish there was more in the container. It does have a slight smell but not overpowering. Not a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M. Burbee

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I feel that this product is definitely superior to other cream removal products I’ve tried. I especially like the texture which is lighter and less runny than others. The scent is also more pleasant. I used this on my face and it was effective at removing the hair without irritating my skin or making me break out. You also get a pretty generous amount of product in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Suzannah

customer_reviews.title: love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Here's the issue: I've got old lady moustache. Admittedly - it's not a good look, not a happy situation at all. Not enough of a moustache to wax or bleach, but prominent little blonde hairs. OK - they're probably grey, but I feel better saying they are blonde. I've already admitted to having a moustache, give me a break. Ugh... the humiliation.This little gadget takes it right off! I can feel a little light stubble growing back, but I can't see anything. And... no more moustache! Now, if it would just take care of my wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how gentle this cream is. I had not used cream hair remover since the days when other creams - and that smelled horrible and was not suited for sensitive skin. Neomen Hair Removal cream is gentle and easy to use. It has a slight smell - but not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: done a good job
customer_reviews.text: This done a good job removing hair. I wish I hadn’t left it on for so long though. It ate at my skin but of course that was my fault. I’ll put cocoa butter on my irritated skin and won’t leave it on until I feel like washing it off next time. Don’t leave this product on skin too long. Just read the directions and don’t scratch your skin and don’t use a puff ball to wash it off of you. It might scratch your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jered

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative
customer_reviews.text: Due to the corona virus pandemic I haven't been able to keep my waxing appointments. I have been waxing for almost 20 years. While self-quarantining I really wanted to avoid shaving, so I ordered this cream. It works wonderfully!! I highly recommend it. Yes, it is not as thorough as waxing. But considering the circumstances, it keeps my bikini line in check.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Rozanski

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. Not only did this not work at all for me, but the tube only lasted one use on my legs. I tried this the week before my vacay because of all the customers reviews. I tried it on my armpits first and it didn’t work and gave me a red rash. So I then tried it on my bikini line and legs, following instructions perfectly - I even left it on a few extra minutes. And literally no change. I ended up having to shave right after. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Ewww
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be honest, I didn’t try it out because the casing itself looked rotten?? When I grab that side of the bottle it even crinkles because it’s been dried out on one side. I don’t know if this was an honest mistake in selling me a spoilt item, unless this is how it looks and smells?
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: does not burn my skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this product roughly once a week! It is so much better than shaving and it doesn't burn my skin. The hair comes off within 8-10 minutes :) Remember to not let it stay on too long.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item!! I’ve struggled with using razors because they really irritate my skin and I’ve been on the hunt for an alternative, and this was perfect!! Easy to use and my hair growth has really slowed down. Can’t say enough good things about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for dark thick hair.
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a product to remove dark thick hair this one does not do it for you... I had to leave it on longer and it still didn't remove it all the way, it even caused a burned red area because of how long I left it because it wouldn't work the first 5 min in the first place...
customer_reviews.author: adorie

customer_reviews.title: Not for Thick Asian Hair
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted to like the product. I really don't like shaving and was hoping I could rely on this to help me out with my thick Asian hair. Not only was this inconsistent and only worked for 60% of the hair but shaving afterwards for its ineffectiveness was IMPOSSIBLE; took me over an hour just to FIX it from this thing. utterly disappointed. Maybe if you have fine or caucasian hair then it'll probably work...
customer_reviews.author: Sang h.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I was gentle and mild smelling. I used it and the hair came right off! I love how smooth it left my skin...
customer_reviews.author: Barbra

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Does not remove hair well. Nair is better and it lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Did remove hair and was painful after removal.
customer_reviews.text: This product did nothing for me. I was so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product contains BABY POWDER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a great way to not, CONTINUALLY, cut myself while shaving. The picture DOESN'T clearly show EVERYTHING, now I just want to have this product RETURNED!
customer_reviews.author: Niambi Ife

customer_reviews.title: Burnt my skin.
customer_reviews.text: Burnt my skin. Have little blister all over. Only left it on for 5 mins like the directions say. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective and not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited after the reviews, but I'm very disappointed. 1. It barely worked after the full 10 minutes. There are patches of hair dissolved, it looks almost like I took my razor and shaved random little spots. 2. To do my lower legs, bikini line, and underarms takes a ton of the amount of cream- I would say easily 1/6 of it, and I tried to conserve as much as possible. Even if it did work, it would still be very pricy 3. It smelled just as strongly/badly as depilatory cream, but mixed with a minty scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: I cannot believe it- it actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Wtf... this stuff actually works! I was the biggest skeptic- thinking all sorts of things... it's going to burn; it's going to leave a rash; it wont work; I will still have to shave after.... NOPE, NOPE, NOPE, NOPE! This stuff is AMAZING! I have extremely sensitive skin and thick leg hair follicles... basically- shaving sucks. I was searching for alternatives and dont trust the light zapping things soooo, I figured- why not? I am so happy (and very surprised) to report success. It does not burn, smell bad or leave any bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work for me, but the product, tool and packaging was nice
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted it to work, but it was one of the worst for my skin. Even did the test spot. I hurt for days. Coulda just been that one, but I wasn't willing to try again and I bought the stuff I used to use. I have psoriasis and this just didn't do what I needed it to, but I could be an exception to the rule, so I give my rating based on my personal experience and unwillingness to try again simply because of my skin issues.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea K. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Painful Underarms
customer_reviews.text: First off I have SUPER SENSITIVE SKIN and absolutely LOVE this product for my legs! No issues or reactions at all and it’s so soft afterwards, and the smell is very mellow! As for armpits, which it clearly states you can use it on safely, absolutely not! It wasn’t even on for 1 minute before it started burning so I immediately started wiping it off and washing the area. I now have chemical burns and a pain that will not go away. I will use the rest in my legs, but I will never again try it on my underarms or even attempt using in any sensitive areas. OUCH!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Mowry

customer_reviews.title: Not suited well for dark or coarse hair
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work for me. I have coarser, dark hair. That may be the problem, I'm not sure. I think if your hair is fineror blonde, it may work well. But it basically only took off the finer hairs on my legs and left me to have to shave anyway, after leaving it on for the max 10 minutes. Also, the tube will only last about 4 applications, which I feel isn't much for the coat of this product. The scent isn't pleasant, either. But no hair removal cream really has a pleasant smell- they always smell like chemicals and burnt hair...
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Hair grew back fairly quickly
customer_reviews.text: The hair removal was difficult as I was trying to remove the hair off my shoulders and across the back. It's hard to get the cream onto the middle of the back with the little spreading and scraping tool. I have sensitive skin and I was red for a day. I was pleased with how long it took to get the hair to come off although I had hair growing back in two days.
customer_reviews.author: KaiKev

customer_reviews.title: Less effective than shaving, plus a rash!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely disappointed in this stuff. I tried it on my bikini line and my little extra sideburn hairs that annoy me. In both places I tried wiping it away after 5 min - hair didn’t budge. I waited the full 10 min and a lot of hair came away, but it just kind of tore off a millimeter or two above the skin. I was left with scratchy, stubbly hairs, a stinging rash, and a few days later, my bikini line still feels itchy and raw like I have a bad case of razor burn. This stuff is worse than useless.
customer_reviews.author: sab14

customer_reviews.title: Work's like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this produce to help get a head start for taking off all the hair on my body for my first bodybuilding competition. This stuff worked like a charm! I definitely left it on more towards 10 minutes, but it got rid of thick, stubborn hair! Will purchase again once I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Payton

customer_reviews.title: Product works great
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try a hair remover for men (I'm a woman), and it's been great. It removes all of the hair with minor to no irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice

customer_reviews.title: Really good stuff I
customer_reviews.text: I have dark hair and this works! A little redness but the moisturiser really helps! Really good stuff I would recommend this to anyone! So quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: What I liked: - Easy to use (comes with a spatula for application) - Good on sensitive skin (I have extremely sensitive skin and had no reaction whatsoever) What I didn't like: - It literally didn't work. This is recommended as the #1 hair removal brand on the market for "coarse, hard to remove hair" (which is me). I had it on for the maximum amount of time and followed the directions exactly, and it literally did not remove 1 single hair follicle.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for this, but it just didn't work for me. I have extremely sensitive skin, multiple allergies and sensitivities to fragrances. I did the requisite test patch and all was well. Even the scent didn't bother me. I liked the little spatula. Following directions, I used this product on two separate occasions, for the maximum of 10 minutes, and it didn't remove any of my leg hair. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: whatithink

customer_reviews.title: Effective and gentle
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time to use it and product is easy to use and apply towards the skin. I love it!!! It also helps for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mediha Neslanovic

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product because i've used similar ones and they've never worked but I was tired of the razor burn and figured i'd give these gels a try. Glad I picked this one - it worked pretty well after letting it sit for 10 minutes and the skin felt really smooth afterwards with no burn. I would recommend it for those trying to escape the 'burn.' Scent wasn't too bad either which is saying something as the chemical smells in this depilatory creams usually reek.
customer_reviews.author: William Mara

customer_reviews.title: Uhhh... what??
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells horrible. It doesnt help that I have a tiny shower but I'm not factoring that into my review because that's my bad. But this stuff doesnt really work. I put it on my right calf and it didnt seem to take off the hair. Then I looked that night and it seemed have taken off some. Then I used it on my nether region and it made my hair all weird feeling and my skin feel like when I have a really tight pony tail in and then I take it out and it feels kinda sore. Like that except my hair just feels tangled and pulled on. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Shaved For decades, for very sensitive skin irritations, eczema, this WORKS WONDERS!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a man, used it for first time tonight. I have ultra very sensitive skin with dermatitis and inflamed follicles (fluticulatis) when shaving, have been shaving for decades now. THIS STUFF WORKS WONDERS!!!! NO IRRITATION AT ALL...use spatula, leave on anywhere between 7 to 10 mins for course hair, which i have, works wonders, i tested very sensitive areas...so far so good! i had to use regular razor for small touch ups, other than that, ....I'm going to test some more sensitive areas later. and let you know..EXCELLENT PRODUCT & RESULTS! Updated 48+ hours later: Did a 2nd application and worked great again! I'm too scared to try even more sensitive areas might try soon...everywhere else works GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Arrr Matey

customer_reviews.title: No bad smell, but didn't work unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a great product. It is easy to use. It does not smell bad. My legs showed no negative side effects. However, after following instructions carefully and testing first, then leaving on for max 10 minutes, it did not remove my hair. Over the following few days, about 50% of the hair broke off at about 1mm long. This is a fail in my opinion. I was looking for smooth legs after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Therese A.

customer_reviews.title: Great results!
customer_reviews.text: Great hair remover and easy to use! I followed the directions and tested an area after 5 min but ultimately needed the full 10 min. After 10 min the hair came off easily in the shower. Results for me lasted about a week. While doing this every week is a bit of a chore, the results were MUCH better than shaving which is what I typically do. I’ll definitely be using regularly!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing feel and results.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to remove my private area hair , under my arms & legs... did a nice job of that ... I would recommend this product it did exactly what it was made to do in the time it said & the smell was mild if any - the only con was that like all of this type of product it’s a bit messy ( to be expected thou ) I will be buying this product again two thumbs up for sure
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this product
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst purchase I’ve made on Amazon. After reading other positive reviews before purchasing, I was excited to give this product a try. That excitement soon disappeared upon use. First off, my box did not include the spatula that the box says it does. Secondly, the smell is awful. I mean awful!!!! And thirdly, this product burnt my skin and left me with raw open wounds. I am highly dissatisfied and would encourage others to avoid it as well. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: K Jonesy

customer_reviews.title: Look to other options
customer_reviews.text: I will not be buying again which I guess means I wouldn’t recommend either. I’ve used other products like this that work better and smell less...repulsive. I had to shave immediately after using this because so much hair was missed, and I waited the maximum 10 minutes. It did leave my skin smooth, but that could have been from my shaving cream since I shaved right after too. The smell though, I had trouble breathing while using it because of the smell. Also it’s a small bottle for the price compared to others like it. Try something else instead of this product, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This is great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I was thoroughly impressed with this product. Easy to use, very little scent. Directions were very clear. I didn't use the spatula that comes with it, just my hands. Worked beautifully the 1st time. This is truly a premium product and I highly recommend. I used the product on a Friday and today is Tuesday and the skin is still smooth. I don't know how long it will ultimately last but I'm happy with it. I never did experience any tingling, redness, or discomfort from using this product.
customer_reviews.author: allaboutcats

customer_reviews.title: Soft and not-smelly
customer_reviews.text: I have really sensitive skin. This product helped me get rid of unwanted hair without irritating my skin. With other creams I usually have irritation and redness, sometimes even my skin puffs up, almost like a rash. This product didn't give me that redness and there was no itchiness or any kind of side effect. I really liked the results. Also, I'm usually upset with the smell of hair removing creams. While there is a scent in this product, it's definitely bearable and not as strong as others. I think I found my cream for life!
customer_reviews.author: MIghtyV

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste the time or money
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair. I bought this so I could maybe not have to shave my legs so often. I have sensitive skin and it irritated my skin a little. I had to leave it on for 10 minutes which is the max to remove any hair. It mostly bleached my legs and leg hair and removed some hair. Not 100% removal. Used dang near the entire tube on just my shins and knees. I'm tall but not that tall. Save your money and invest in wax or a good razor. Dried my legs too. Update... hair regrowth for the small amount of hair it removed just like shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy as one, two, three
customer_reviews.text: This product works but with most products you must wait at least 5 min to remove hair. I waited longer because I had never used it i waited an extra 5 and wow! Wow! Wow! It was all off at once. Smell wise it was not so bad it actually smelled way less than most I've tried. This didn't burn, came in on time and comes with a little plastic spatula which makes it easier to remove and put on. This is pretty handy if you don't want dark spots and regrowth for more than a week. This is must specially if you need a quick fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cream!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just what I needed. Would recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Deneira

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the results of this hair removal cream. The reviews made it sound like this miracle product so I was happy to give it a try. Unfortunately it did not work. I followed the instructions and left it on for 10 mins. The results were nothing better than a razor could do. I tried it on my bikini line and it left stubble and bumps. It looked terrible. I also tried it on my stomach, to test it on very thin hair, and it still left stubble. It does not completely remove the hair. Just trims it really. Shaving is better and faster... but for complete hair removal I’ll stick to waxing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works better than Sally (on upper lip)!
customer_reviews.text: Works so much better than the Sally Hansen Face Creme. Left this on for 8 minutes on upper lip and it removed all the hair, unlike the Sally one. Also the smell is so much better than Sally’s as well. Slight odor to it but nowhere near as bad as some hair removal lotions. The upper lip area is lightly red after application and stings a bit. But nothing too bad and I have fairly sensitive skin. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SMA

customer_reviews.title: It worked well for us, so give it a chance!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly we were really impressed with how well it worked on my boyfriends back. He’s Italian and really hairy so we usually use nair but it can burn him sometimes, even the sensitive stuff. We have this stuff a shot and it worked beautifully! The only thing I’d say is the spatula they give you is great for removal but not applying. I just used my hands and it worked a lot better. But really he loved it it didn’t burn or irritated his skin so I think we found a winner!
customer_reviews.author: jenna larbig

customer_reviews.title: Super effective and gentle!
customer_reviews.text: I have really been enjoying this stuff. I have used it for hair on my face and it does a great job and doesn't leave my skin irritated or red at all. I also think the smell is surprisingly light for hair removal cream. Most claim to be for sensitive skin or to have a good smell but this one actually lives up to that claim. It kinda has a light aloe/eucalyptus scent to me. I love the scraper tool it comes with because I don't have to put on a glove to slather it on and it makes it super quick and easy to get on and off. Overall super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Useless!!
customer_reviews.text: This product barely removed any hair. I left it on well past the recommended time. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: misty barrios

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Customer service
customer_reviews.text: This does not work at all. I have very fine blond hair and it did almost nothing. I even left it on for ten minutes. Garbage. Updating review: Although this product did not work for me due to an allergic reaction, the company contacted me and offered a full refund and a $20 Amazon gift card. I highly recommend this company for its fabulous customer service during this difficult time. So feel free to buy with confidence
customer_reviews.author: Catbaloo

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin at all
customer_reviews.text: Awful horrible experience with this product. Never again. Not for sensitive skin. Burned my underarms and now it will take months and months to get my skin back to its original color. Of course I spot checked it before applying to my underarms. This is just after five minutes of the cream being applied to my skin. It was highly rated on amazon but the cheaper Veet alternative worked better for me. Be careful you guys.
customer_reviews.author: Fruitcake

customer_reviews.title: It's okay...
customer_reviews.text: You're going to need a lot of this, and for the price it should really come in a much larger bottle. You need to use a lot of the stuff to be effective. Works good if you use enough of it, but smells a bit of rotten eggs when you take it off. It might sting a little, but I wouldn't say it hurts it all. I'd give it 3.5 stars if I could. I'd price a bottle it's size at 7 or 8 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: BKRW

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more from this, however, I’ve never used any type of hair removal cream. I used it and it removed majority of the hair, however did leave some stubble. Which is not what I wanted in the bikini line area, so I still had to shave the stubble that was left. To me, that’s just extra work. I do have sensitive skin and had no issues with that. The smell isn’t very pleasant at all. I’m on the fence as to if I’ll ever buy it again. I have issues with razor burn when I shave too often, but like I said, it didn’t do the full job I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as shaving.
customer_reviews.text: Yes it removes hair, anywhere. However, its NOT permanent. Removes the hair just like shaving, hair returns with bumps and irritation just like shaving. Took longer than 10min for the hair to be easy to wipe off, 15-20min for me. Rather than walk around naked with the cream on before showering for 20min, I'd rather just shower and shave when I'm ready. I am caucasian, have dark hair and was hoping for something more.
customer_reviews.author: jill11

customer_reviews.title: Great product for young kids! Good first experience
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my daughter. She is not even a teenager but she had some hair in the armpit. I didn’t want to use something aggressive with her, so she would have a good first introduction to this. This product was very good, she only complain that it was a bit hot for a minute or so after I take it out. Great complain for a first experience. It has been 10 days and we didn’t need to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Decent substitute for shaving or trimming but not a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Effectiveness is okay - not all targeted hairs are weakened sufficiently. Usually takes at least 10 minutes for my unwanted hair. Area should be washed & scrubbed with soap after the effect is achieved. After-effects are inconsistent; sometimes hair growth is slowed, other times it seems accelerated versus shaving. Sensitive skin will be slightly irritated after use; irritation subsides within 2 days. Best to use for the most bothersome hair; less significant areas might as well be shaved. Funky smell reminiscent of sulfur compounds.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honest and say I felt this purchase was a shot in the dark since hair removal creams I've attempted in the past have either failed to work, or produced some kind of side effect like irritated skin. I was SO happily surprised to discover that this Neomen Hair Removal Cream actually works and has absolutely no negative side effects whatsoever! Not only does it completely wipe the hair away with the nifty gadget that comes with it, but it leaves my legs feeling incredibly smooth. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone, and plan on continuing to purchase it as long as it's made available!
customer_reviews.author: R P

customer_reviews.title: Did what it's meant to do
customer_reviews.text: After using it a couple times, I've come to realize that I have relatively thicker leg and bikini line hair. However, the lotion did remove it! I just had to leave it on for 10 minutes, and maybe do it a second time. The smell wasn't amazing, but it didn't deteriorate from the usefulness of the product. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe May

customer_reviews.title: what
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing. Applied as directed, did not remove hair. Tried on coarse and fine hair with the same result - nothing. It didn't irritate my skin which is a plus but it did nothing for hair removal. Wouldn't recommend or re-purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Miz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results—follow directions
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I bought this. I absolutely hate shaving my bikini area (and I mean ALL of it) because of ingrown hairs and how long it takes to get every spot. Waxing is painful and expensive. This has solved all my problems and the best part is that it only takes about 5 minutes. Seriously start with 5 min and go from there. (Absolutely do not exceed 10 minutes).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cream!
customer_reviews.text: I was a long-time user of Nair, but haven't been so happy of late and wanted to try Neomen given its great reviews. I wasn't disappointed! It was very easy to use, and I didn't need to do a second application for the hair to be removed from my legs, which was great. I have super sensitive skin, but got no reaction at all from using this cream. I can't tell you how grateful I am to have found it!
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl in VA

customer_reviews.title: Didn't remove one hair, not ONE! Super watery formula, DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this and give it a try based on the reviews. I have thick hair on my legs, it stated it was for all hair types and I specifically looked for reviews from people with thick hair so that's why i ordered it. It was very watery and didn't stick to the hair at all. I left it on for the max amount of time listed and NOT ONE HAIR was removed, NOT ONE. It did absolutely nothing, NOTHING!!! If I could give it zero stars I would. Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Shaleen Dove

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: I am not one of the people that can shave and shape their eyebrows or upper lip. I will end up cutting myself. have used Nair for years but always had to do at lease 2 days before going out as I would get red chemical looking burn and have to put ointment on it I tried this product WHAT A DIFFERENCE It didn't have a smell and I did not get chemical burn. I have shared my experience with everyone I wish I would have found this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Graves

customer_reviews.title: Hair Removal Cream
customer_reviews.text: Honest review, no damages to the package, easy to apply, hair removal went smoothly on arms with no pain and no redness, underarms however there was pain and some redness and did not remove hair at all, even left it on to the max time suggested at 10 min. I have very sensitive skin. I even clean the areas before apply and used warm water to rinse. My next attempt is to try on my legs. The scent is not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: kitkat284

customer_reviews.title: Ha ha if your hairy woman this won’t work for you
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it did not work for me I don’t know if it’s because I’m too hairy or it just doesn’t work but it didn’t work for me I’ve tried it twice and my hairs were still there did not come off and it was very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Terrible reaction!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I used this product and had a terrible reaction. I tested it out on my leg to make sure it was ok for my skin. It seemed fine, but after I used it on my under arms, I woke up in the night to my skin burning! My skin was red, bumpy, and swollen. I usually don't leave product reviews, but I just want people with sensitive skin to be very careful when trying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing on tough jobs!
customer_reviews.text: So I waited a long time before shaving (quarantine, and all) and decided a razor would just not cut it LOL After reading the reviews, I bought this product and I was a bit skeptical with the amount of hair I needed gone. I let it sit for the max of 10 minutes and used a cloth to remove the hair and it came right off! My legs were so smooth and silky after! The only downside is the smell which is the typical hair removal cream smell. It did not burn my legs at all, except for my bikini area, which was still not too bad. I definitely will be using this again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Brancato

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well :)
customer_reviews.text: For a person that has a lot of hair and sensitive skin this product worked well. Smells and harsh chemicals usually bother my skin and allergies but this product was great for that, little to no smell or irrigation. This product was able to remove a good portion of my hair. I tend to grow thick, coarse, dark hair and hair removal creams don't normal work for me but this was able to get most the hairs. Overall I would recommend this product to anyone looking for an alternative to shaving.
customer_reviews.author: christopher pakdel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a lower maintenance alternative to shaving my bikini area, and it was pretty disappointing. I left it on for the full ten minutes and it barely had any effect. Didn’t bother my skin at all, so I guess that’s a plus. It did weaken the hair so the hair broke off to a shorter length, and left me with some irritating stubble. I even tried it the next day, thinking maybe it needed a second pass. Still didn’t work, ended up shaving anyways. I don’t recommend it if you have thicker hair.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on sensitive areas & works well
customer_reviews.text: Neomen Hair Remover worked great! I left the product on for 5 mins on my legs, arm pits, and bikini line. It worked best on my bikini area. All the hair came off. My arm pits I left on a few mins longer. The hair removing tool didn't work well, but I just used a clean wet rag and wipe the hair in a downward motion and it came off pleasantly well. Next time I will use a body scrub on my legs the day before using because it did leave a few stragglers because the hair was ingrown. I notice the hair has grown back slower as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Using with folliculitis
customer_reviews.text: I have a skin condition called folliculitis, and any time I have tried to shave my arms or use a hair removal cream on them, my skin has broken out. There's next to nothing on the internet that gives any advice on products to use with folliculitis, so everything I've used has been trial and error. This product still irritared my skin, but far less than any other product I've tried. I believe that anyone without folliculitis would be pleased with this product. I would have continued to use it and repurchase it if I didn't have this skin condition. I definitely thinks it's worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah V

customer_reviews.title: Holy Cow This Stuff Works!
customer_reviews.text: So, my husband bought this and I was super skeptical. We've tried it all in the past. He's pretty darn hairy and one bottle pretty covered his entire chest and back. It was super easy to use and despite the bathroom smelling stinky (just lit a candle and it was gone) I would highly recommend this. I couldn't believe it. I have never seen my husband hair-free before. He has sensitive skin and it didn't bother his skin at all!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Stoia

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Was really hopeful this would work. Applied as directions stated and left on the maximum amount of time it stated in the directions. Only removed about 25% of leg hair. Will be returning for a refund. Bummer, I was really looking forward to it working.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Matuska

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I tried it the first day I got it, left it on for ten minutes on a test spot and when I wiped it off, it did not clear the hair. I tried again on the same patch for another ten minutes and it only cleared a tiny bit of the hair in that spot. Tried a third time for another ten minutes and when I wiped it off, it got most of the hair. I left it and two days later the removed hair was growing right back. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The bio here is misleading from the product
customer_reviews.text: The scent is horrible but the cream removes some hair. I had to use a razor to finish the job, I ordered the cream to prevent it but now I'm scared. I did not get to read the back before I had applied it to the hair of my vagina & pubic region, closer to the vagina the skin is tender & it feels like needles scraping down my thigh when I piss. I had originally ordered the cream to avoid hurting myself and I did. I don't know if my vagina is alright but I'm confident that I cleaned it out.
customer_reviews.author: Neva Larson

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is one of those products that some love and some hate. Make sure to do the testing patch before you put this everywhere. I tried to use it on 2 occasions in two different spots and each time it resulted in the follicle becoming incredibly irritated and then look scabbed over the next day without removing any hair. Probably just varies based off skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Amara

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin in my bikini area, this stuff worked amazing! I don't love the smell, but I'll continue to use it because of how well it removed the hair and for how long the hair stayed gone. I left it on for ten minutes then used a washcloth in the shower to remove the hair, easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work..!
customer_reviews.text: So first, I'd like to say how much I love the applicator tool. It makes it 100% more of a pleasant experience! I've been trying to use this on my neck hair, and after use my neck feels SUPER smooth and the product works fast! I do get redness right after use, but goes away after I wash and lotion the area. However, the hair comes back faster than I'd like. Maybe I need to use it more to see if the hair slowly stops growing there. Anyways, great product! I love the smell and that it doesn't feel like straight chemicals on the skin (:
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent hair remover. I've used Veet for sensitive skin for years, but they must have changed their formula because the last bottle I bought would not remove bikini line hair. Neomen does the job well. It did not burn the VERY sensitive regions beyond the bikini line either, which Veet did at times. This product is virtually scentless and doesn't have the strong chemical smell other hair removers attempt to cover up with perfumes. Plus, you can get all the cream out of the tube. Overall, I believe I've found a great hair remover in Neomen Cream! I recommend it and will buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Green

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this product as it had received great reviews. Unfortunately this product didn't work for me at all. I applied the product as directed with the spatula to my bikini line. Waited 5 minutes, nothing. Waited another 5 minutes, hair still intact.
customer_reviews.author: Kassi

customer_reviews.title: Use a thick layer or thicker/coarse hair
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I relied on reviews I read for this product and figured I’ll buy it. I used it on my bikini line where I have thick dark hair. I did a test spot at 5 min and saw no results. I left it on for about 9-10min and removed it with the (included) spatula like the directions said. I was HIGHLY disappointed. Then... I used a wash cloth with warm water and I was shocked!! *most* of the hair was gone. I think my mistake was not putting a thick enough coat on, so make sure you do a good layer if you’re going over thicker hair. I will try again in a few days with that thicker layer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I have generally thick hair that grows back really quick with regular shaving. I have tried hair removal creams before and was just not satisfied. But this one. Easy application. The tool was especially helpful with the application. I kept on for ten minutes and then just scraped away. And the smoothness lasted a lot longer than shaving. And left legs feeling moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: nely rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleanup and ZERO pain.
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge skeptic and am especially cautious buying things on Amazon nowadays, but this thing actually works. I will never have to get my Italian lip waxed again! I am highly allergic to even the wax that is made for sensitive skin and I always break out. This thing will now save me that discomfort. I wish it had precision tools for the eyebrows, but I'm happy enough using it on the rest of my face. Highly recommend it. Easy cleanup and ZERO pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Best removal cream I've found
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I hate shaving, but loath body hair. This is easy and only takes a few minutes prior to a shower to eliminate those unpleasant bristles. The applicator helps spread this magic serum. Be sure to check in 5 minutes, especially if it is your first stint or you are functioning fur banishment on a new or sensitive area.
customer_reviews.author: Oakheart

customer_reviews.title: An amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for almost a month are so it works exactly as described!! A bonus is the smell isn't too strong nor to put it nicely 'bad' smelling like some other hair removal products! I have to keep it on my skin for 10 minutes the max time due to stubborn hair. But even then no burning sensation when my hair does finally grow back which takes almost 2 weeks are so it's not as thick at all! This is a must-have product I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: I Was Completely and Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was completely surprised at how well the NEOMEM Hair Removal Cream worked and best of all...it didn't irritate my skin and it's pretty much odorless compared to other products . I hate hair down there and I took care of the sack, crack and the carrot. This is the only hair removal cream that did not irritate my nether region. I will definitely be using this from now on.
customer_reviews.author: T.W.A.

customer_reviews.title: Where is my clothes pin?
customer_reviews.text: This product works sort of but not good enough to compensate for the vial odor. Don't know why that part wasn't stressed enough on prior's reviews. For those of you too young to know what a clothes pin is, its something that was used to hang washed clothing on a clothes line for them to dry. :)
customer_reviews.author: Creative Ca

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing
customer_reviews.text: I let my leg hair grow for nearly a week so that I could try this stuff. I waited for 15 minutes, because the tests at 5 and 10 minutes both showed no results. The picture is of my leg after 15 minutes. This stuff did absolutely nothing for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I CANT LIKE THIS ENOUGH! I didn’t shave AT LEAST 5 days (underarms) *don’t judge*. I put this on for the longest time (10 minutes). AMAZING! I didn’t even have to go over it with a razor or anything!!! The cream itself doesn’t smell like chemicals. It’s smooth and silky. Now it Is slightly uncomfy to scrape it off but then again your literally scraping a piece of plastic down your underarms so what do you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha smith

customer_reviews.title: Okay but shaving is smoother.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this product because I have sensitive skin. It worked without irritation of my skin. But the hair grew back just as fast as shaving. Also, it seemed to leave the skin somewhat rough than shaving. I went back to the razor for smoother skin. Notice there is no category on this review for effectiveness. I’d give that an average ranking.
customer_reviews.author: D. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: MUCH better than other hair removal products
customer_reviews.text: I found this product very simple to use, it did not have as strong of a smell as other hair removal products, and it was much gentler on my sensitive skin. I typically have horrible red bumps and burning when using hard removers and this one was a much better experience. The hair wiped away easily for the most part. I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: No more razor burns
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing this product. It works very good at hair removal. I use it for my armpits and even though it doesn’t say to use for face, I do use it for my eyebrows. I follow instructions and it doesn’t irritate my skin. Does not leave my skin with an itchy, rash, razor burn like razors do. I like the spatula to help scrape the cream off, only my armpits. I use a wet towel for my eyebrows. I recommend purchasing Neomen Hair Removal Cream for easy convenience & no Razor burns.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Schull

customer_reviews.title: Attention Men!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to figure out a way to shave my private area without blades or razors.. let’s be Honest MEN It can get scary trying to mow the lawn especially on the soft skin area Where the Jewels hang Lol.. so I decided to use this product since my wife already had it.. and let me tell you it works wonders!! It’s safe and easy! I now actually look forward on getting myself clean!
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great Cream - Really Effective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because it is cruelty free and the product works quickly. I am completely satisfied that it works better than other hair-removal products I've used in the past. The smell is much more mild than other brands and I felt the effectiveness was much better and the product left my skin moisturized. I'm really happy with this purchase and would recommend this product over other options.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton😁

customer_reviews.title: No burn but does it work?
customer_reviews.text: Tried on my legs. I do have sensitive skin and there was zero burn. To the point where I was entirely unsure if it was even going to do anything! Removed some hair but there is still A LOT left over. It could be I wasn’t applying evenly since I just kind of slapped it on as you can see in my pictures. I’ll keep using and update if I learn something new. It does say a maximum of 10 minutes but I left it on for 12 minutes. Smell is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyomi

product_meta.title: Neomen Hair Removal Cream - Premium Depilatory Cream - Skin Friendly Painless Flawless Hair Remover Cream for Women and Men
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY: Depilatory Cream has safe formula with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E and Baby Oil to leave skin feeling moisturized. Please do an allergy test on hands before use.
EASY & FAST: Hair Removal Cream is easy to operate, effectively removes hair in as little as five minutes.
SAFE: Dermatologist tested Hair Removal Cream, no nicks or bumps left on the skin. Hair removal closer to the root.
CONVENIENT: Portable size, easy to carry and use. Suitable for underarms, bikini line, arms and legs( we don't recommend using it on face).
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Our goal is 100% customer satisfaction. You are Backed by Our 30 Days, No Hassle, No Questions Asked 100% Money Back Guarantee. Buy now RISK-FREE.
